channel.title: About on Fuzzy Logic
channel.description: Recent content in About on Fuzzy Logic

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Leo, a software developer based in the Balkans. My love for programming blogs began during my first year in the field and has only grown since. I tend to be an easy going person, but when programming is involved, sometimes I let my feelings get the better of me, I can easily be annoyed by the smallest, least important things (alas the “Grumpy and petty!”). Welcome to Fuzzy Logic(™)(©) my personal fuming and occasionally educational space
